tool_description: An API to get the current time. REST Services that will return current date/time in JSON for any registered time zone.
name: World Clock
title: World Clock

api_list.name: Coordinated Universal Time
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://world-clock.p.rapidapi.com/json/utc/now"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "world-clock.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Current Time (within a Timezone)
api_list.description: Get the Current Time for EST
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://world-clock.p.rapidapi.com/json/est/now"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "world-clock.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://world-clock.p.rapidapi.com/json/{time_zone}/now"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "world-clock.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: JSONP
